long_description: The Nathan VaporShape Hydration vest provides storage and hydration on the go; it moves in harmony with your shoulder and upper-back movements to reduce wasted energy. Shoulder straps are ergonomically contoured for a woman's body shape. Mesh shoulder straps and back panel channel air across your body and wick moisture away to improve overall comfort. Soft-touch, elastic perimeter keeps the vest in place. Zippered reservoir compartment zips open and provides quick access to 1.5 liter hydration bladder. Dual shoulder strap pockets easily fit water bottles or energy snacks. Sternum strap and waist belt keep vest in place. The Nathan VaporShape Hydration vest has zippered side pockets perfect for stashing small items. Please note: for sizing, please order based on normal clothing size.
short_description: The Nathan VaporShape Hydration vest provides storage and hydration on the go; it moves in harmony with your shoulder and upper-back movements to reduce wasted energy.
